scripts.start: concurrently "cd front-end && npm run preview --host" "cd back-end && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd front-end && npm run dev" "cd back-end && npm run start:dev"
scripts.preinstall: cd front-end && npm i && cd back-end && npm i
scripts.build: cd front-end && npm run build && cd back-end && npm run build
